Giantslaying.name: Giantslaying
Giantslaying.description: This Creature deals additional damage to larger targets, but less damage to smaller targets
Giantslaying.effect:
Outgoing damage against Creatures with DragWeight 500+ is increased by 2.5%/3.75%/5.0%
Outgoing damage against Creatures with DragWeight 200- is decreased by 7.5%/11.25%/15.0%

Protective.name: Protective
Protective.description: This Creature is fiercely protective of its rider, even after they're no longer riding it
Protective.effect: Reduce rider damage taken by 15.0%/22.5%/30.0%. Persists for 10 seconds after dismounting

Kingslaying.name: Kingslaying
Kingslaying.description: This Creature has an instinctual dislike for "important" enemies, but is less aggressive otherwise
Kingslaying.effect: Increase damage done to Alphas and Bosses by 5.0%/7.5%/10.0%, but reduce damage to everything else by 10%/15%/20%

Angry.name: Angry
Angry.description: Gain an outgoing-damage boost as health falls
Angry.effect: Deal an additional up to 1.25%/1.875%/2.5% outgoing-damage as health reaches 50-25%

Swimmer.name: Aquatic/Swimmer
Swimmer.description: This Creature has adapted to life in water
Swimmer.effect:
Swimming speed increased by 7.5%/11.25%/15%
Oxygen drain while submerged reduced by 12.5%/18.75%/25.0%
Stamina-drain from swim-sprinting reduced by 4%/6%/8%

FrailBase.name: %s-Frail
FrailBase.description: This Creature has a frail %s gene, and its offspring are more likely to inherit the lower of its parent's %s stats
FrailBase.effect: This Creature's offspring have a -1.5%/2.25%/3% chance to inherit the higher %s stat of its parents

MutableBase.name: Mutable %s
MutableBase.description: This Creature's %s stat is highly mutable, making its offspring more likely to gain mutations
MutableBase.effect: This Creature's offspring have a +1%/1.5%/2% chance to mutate, and an extra chance to mutate into %s

RobustBase.name: %s-Robust
RobustBase.description: This Creature has a robust %s gene, and its offspring are more likely to inherit the higher of its parent's %s stats
RobustBase.effect: This Creature's offspring have a +1.5%/2.25%/3% chance to inherit the higher %s stat of its parents

AberrantCarrier.name: Cave-Bearing
AberrantCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of Aberration items in its inventory

PlantCarrier.name: Plant-Bearing
PlantCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of plants in its inventory
PlantCarrier.effect:
Reduces the weight of the following Resources by 15.0%/22.5%/30%, when in its in its inventory:
Thatch, Wood, Fibers, Berries (all types)

ExoticCarrier.name: Exotic-Bearing
ExoticCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of exotic items in its inventory

ScorchedCarrier.name: Desert-Bearing
ScorchedCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of Scorched Earth items in its inventory

MeatCarrier.name: Meat-Bearing
MeatCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of meat in its inventory

CarcassCarrier.name: Carcass-Bearing
CarcassCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of carcasses in its inventory

ExtinctionCarrier.name: Waste-Bearing
ExtinctionCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of some Extinction items in its inventory

MineralCarrier.name: Mineral-Bearing
MineralCarrier.description: Reduces the weight of minerals in its inventory

Numb.name: Numb
Numb.description: This Creature can ignore damage... for a time
Numb.effect:
Damage taken by this Creature is reduced by 25%/37.5%/50%, but it gains a DoT that deals that damage over the next 5 seconds
This DoT cannot be reduced by any means

Nocturnal.name: Nocturnal
Nocturnal.description: This Creature has adapted to be more active at night
Nocturnal.effect: Reduces Stamina consumption during night time by 2.5%/3.7%/5.0%

Distracting.name: Distracting
Distracting.description: This Creature distracts targets it hits, causing them to deal less damage to anything other than itself
Distracting.effect: Non-allied targets that take damage from this Creature's melee attacks deal 5.0%/7.5%/10.0% less damage to all other targets for 20 seconds

Tenacious.name: Tenacious
Tenacious.description: This Creature gains incoming-damage reduction as health falls
Tenacious.effect:
This Creature gains incoming-damage reduction as health falls
Damage taken is reduced by up to 12.5%/18.75%/25.0% as health reaches 50-25%

Fatty.name: Fatty
Fatty.description: This Creature's fat acts as a protective layer against incoming damage
Fatty.effect: Gain X Armor for each point in Food

Cowardly.name: Cowardly
Cowardly.description: This Creature gets faster when being attacked
Cowardly.effect: Whenever this Creature receives damage from a non-allied target, it gains a 2.5%/3.75%/5.0% movespeed buff for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits

Frenetic.name: Frenetic
Frenetic.description: This Creature recovers torpor more quickly than normal

Athletic.name: Athletic
Athletic.description: This Creature's high lung capacity allows it to quickly regenerate Health and Stamina
Athletic.effect: Gain 0.05/0.075/0.1 health-regen and 0.0005/0.00075/0.001 stamina-regen for each point in Oxygen

Vampiric.name: Vampiric
Vampiric.description: This Creature recovers health equal to a percentage of the damage it deals
Vampiric.effect: Gains 5.0%/7.5%/10.0% of damage dealt as health, determined by size (smaller Creatures get more)

HeavyHitting.name: Heavy-Hitting
HeavyHitting.description: This Creature hits harder, but less quickly
HeavyHitting.effect: Melee damage increased by 2.5%/3.75%/5.0%, but attack speed reduced by 5%/7.5%/10.0%

Carefree.name: Carefree
Carefree.description: This Creature is faster when it isn't thinking about fighting
Carefree.effect: Gains X% movespeed that is lost for 20 seconds after dealing/receiving damage or gaining a rider

QuickHitting.name: Quick-Hitting
QuickHitting.description: This Creature hits more quickly, but for less damage
QuickHitting.effect: Attack speed increased by 2.5%/3.75%/5.0%, but melee damage reduced by 5.0%/7.5%/10.0%

Diurnal.name: Diurnal
Diurnal.description: This Creature has adapted to be more active at day
Diurnal.effect: Reduces Stamina consumption during day time by 2.5%/3.75%/5.0%

Warm.name: Warm
Warm.description: This Creature is uncommonly warm, protecting its rider from the cold
Warm.effect:
Creature and its rider gain 40/60/80 Hypothermic Insulation
Reduces incoming damage from Cold attacks (ice-breath type stuff) by 5.0%/7.5%/10.0%

Sprinter.name: High Endurance
Sprinter.description: This Creature can run for longer than most
Sprinter.effect: Stamina-drain from sprinting is decreased by 4%/6%/8%

SlowMetabolism.name: Slow-Metabolism
SlowMetabolism.description: This Creature burns through its food stores slowly

Cold.name: Cold
Cold.description: This Creature is uncommonly cool, protecting its rider from the heat
Cold.effect:
Creature and its rider gain 40/60/80 Hyperthermic Insulation
Reduces incoming damage from Heat attacks (fire-breath type stuff) by 5.0%/7.5%/10.0%

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: This Creature gets faster when attacking
Aggressive.effect: Whenever this Creature deals damage to a non-allied target, it gains a 2.5%/3.75%/5.0% movespeed buff for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits

AggressiveCheat1.name: Aggressive (cheat 1)
AggressiveCheat1.description: This Creature gets faster when attacking
AggressiveCheat1.effect: Whenever this Creature deals damage to a non-allied target, it gains a X% movespeed buff for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits

AggressiveCheat2.name: Aggressive (cheat 2)
AggressiveCheat2.description: This Creature gets faster when attacking
AggressiveCheat2.effect: Whenever this Creature deals damage to a non-allied target, it gains a X% movespeed buff for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits

Excitable.name: Excitable
Excitable.description: This Creature gets excited the more it's in combat, following up simple attacks with more powerful ones
Excitable.effect: Hitting an enemy with this Creature's basic melee attack reduces the cooldown of its other abilities by 0.25/0.375/0.5 seconds

FastLearner.name: Fast Learner
FastLearner.description: This Creature has a natural aptitude for growth and learning new skills
